certification.description: Demonstrate expertise in implementing and managing hybrid solutions using Windows Server and Azure technologies

faq.question: Do I need an Azure subscription?
faq.answer: Yes, hands-on labs require an Azure subscription. We provide credits for lab exercises, but having your own subscription is beneficial for continued learning.

faq.question: Is this course technical?
faq.answer: Yes, this is a highly technical course requiring Windows Server administration experience and PowerShell knowledge. Prior IT infrastructure experience is essential.

faq.question: What Windows Server versions are covered?
faq.answer: The course covers Windows Server 2022, 2019, and hybrid scenarios with Azure integration. Legacy versions are covered for migration scenarios.

faq.question: Will I learn about Azure Arc?
faq.answer: Yes, Azure Arc is a major component of the course, covering server management, Kubernetes integration, and hybrid resource management.
